mapper.select: SELECT STORE_NO STORE_NO, PRODUCT_NO PRODUCT_NO, STORE_STOCK_EA STORE_STOCK_EA FROM STORE_STOCK ORDER BY STORE_NO ASC

SELECT s.STORE_NO STORE_NO, s.PRODUCT_NO PRODUCT_NO, p.PRODUCT_NAME PRODUCT_NAME s.STORE_STOCK_EA STORE_STOCK_EA FROM STORE_STOCK s LEFT JOIN PRODUCT p ON s.PRODUCT_NO = p.PRODUCT_NO WHERE s.STORE_NO = #{type2} ORDER BY STORE_NO ASC

SELECT s.STORE_NO STORE_NO, s.PRODUCT_NO PRODUCT_NO, p.PRODUCT_NAME PRODUCT_NAME, s.STORE_STOCK_EA STORE_STOCK_EA FROM STORE_STOCK s LEFT JOIN PRODUCT p ON s.PRODUCT_NO = p.PRODUCT_NO WHERE s.STORE_NO = #{type2} AND PRODUCT_TYPE LIKE #{type} AND s.PRODUCT_NO LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{keyword1}, '%') AND p.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{keyword2}, '%') ORDER BY s.PRODUCT_NO ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STORE_STOCK ( STORE_NO, PRODUCT_NO, STORE_STOCK_EA) VALUES ( #{STORE_NO}, #{PRODUCT_NO}, #{STORE_STOCK_EA})
